title: Classic Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty with melted cheddar, lettuce, tomato, and our special sauce.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese, and garlic croutons.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil.

description: Crispy chicken breast with spicy mayo, lettuce, and pickles.

title: BBQ Bacon Burger
description: Grilled beef patty topped with crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, and tangy BBQ sauce.

title: Greek Salad
description: Crisp lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, feta cheese, olives, and Greek dressing.

title: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni slices.

title: Veggie Delight Wrap
description: A flavorful wrap filled with grilled vegetables, hummus, and tzatziki sauce.
